TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable PeerNearMe extends System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer implements class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class PeerNearMe Inherits Peer Implements IEquatable(Of PeerNearMe), ISerializable
type PeerNearMe = class inherit Peer interface IEquatable<PeerNearMe> interface ISerializable

summary.span: 表示通过“网络邻居”基础结构找到的对等方。

span.span: Represents a peer located by the "People Near Me" infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能直接创建此类的实例。An instance of this class cannot be created directly. 相反，通过使用静态方法返回附近对等方的集合，来获取调用对等节点的对等方的引用 。Instead, a reference to the peers "near" the calling peer is obtained by using the static method to return a collection of nearby peers. 对象表示的对等方 不一定在调用对等方的通讯簿中。A peer represented by a object is not necessarily in the calling peer's address book.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检索的数据存储在由和方法以及属性访问的缓存中 。The data retrieved is stored in a cache accessed by the and methods as well as the property. 仅当调用方未订阅指定的、或时，才需要使用方法 。The method only needs to be used if the caller is not subscribed to the specified , , or . 此方法阻止其他调用，直到网络操作完成且缓存已更新。This method blocks additional calls until the network operation is complete and the cache has been updated. 调用方不需要使用方法进行登录 ，或通过中的用户界面进行登录以成功完成此操作。The caller is not required to sign in with the method or via a user interface in to complete this operation successfully.

summary.span: 发出 事件信号。

span.span: Signals the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从此类继承的类可以重写此方法，以便在事件发生时执行其他任务 。Classes that inherit from this class can override this method to perform additional tasks when the event occurs. 此方法还允许派生类在不附加委托的情况下处理事件。This method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中，请务必调用此方法的基类实现，以便已注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: In a derived class, be sure to call the base class' implementation of this method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检索的数据存储在由和方法以及属性访问的缓存中 。The data retrieved is stored in a cache accessed by the and methods as well as the property. 仅当调用方未订阅指定的、或时，才需要使用此 方法 。This method only needs to be used if the caller is not subscribed to the specified , , or . 此方法阻止其他调用，直到网络操作完成且缓存已更新。This method blocks additional calls until the network operation is complete and cache has been updated. 调用方不需要使用方法进行登录 ，或通过中的用户界面进行登录以成功完成此操作。The caller is not required to sign in with the method or via a user interface in to complete this operation successfully.
